title: Trump to make a 'major statement' on Sunday - White House
text:
U.S. President Donald Trump departs for South Carolina Reuters

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump plans to make a "major statement" at the White House at 9 a.m. EST (1300 GMT) on Sunday, White House spokesman Hogan Gidley said on Saturday.

Gidley gave no further details.

Earlier, Trump tweeted: "Something very big has just happened!"

Trump has been under pressure over a Democratic-led impeachment inquiry and has faced stiff criticism for his U.S. troop withdrawal from Syria.

(Reporting by Steve Holland; Editing by Lincoln Feast)
description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump plans to make a "major statement" at the White House at 9 a.m. EST (1300 GMT) on Sunday, White House spokesman Hogan Gidley said on Saturday.
